statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data LIMIT 10
SELECT camera_id, lidar_id, radar_id FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(camera_id) AS avg_camera_id FROM sensor_data GROUP BY camera_id
SELECT DISTINCT lidar_id FROM sensor_data ORDER BY lidar_id DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE radar_id = 3 AND camera_data->'object' = 'car'
SELECT timestamp, camera_id, camera_data FROM sensor_data WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE lidar_id = 2 AND radar_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp, AVG(camera_id) AS avg_camera_id FROM sensor_data
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY camera_id ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT camera_id, lidar_id, radar_id FROM sensor_data WHERE TIMESTAMP > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM cameras;
SELECT camera_id, resolution FROM cameras ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value FROM sensors WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT * FROM cameras WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT camera_id, capture_time FROM cameras ORDER BY capture_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM cameras WHERE location LIKE 'New York%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_time FROM sensors WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM cameras;
SELECT location, resolution FROM cameras WHERE framerate > 30;
SELECT camera_id, resolution, location FROM cameras WHERE camera_id = 2;
SELECT location, detection_range, accuracy FROM radar ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM lidar WHERE scan_range >= 100 ORDER BY lidar_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cameras WHERE resolution = '1080p' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, framerate FROM cameras WHERE framerate > 30;
SELECT radar_id, location, detection_range FROM radar ORDER BY detection_range DESC;
SELECT * FROM lidar WHERE scan_range BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT location, resolution FROM cameras WHERE resolution LIKE '4%';
SELECT * FROM camera_data;
SELECT id, image_path FROM camera_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, image_path FROM camera_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, image_path FROM camera_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, timestamp, image_path FROM camera_data WHERE image_path LIKE '%/images/%';
SELECT * FROM sensor_metadata WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, sensor_type, location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_type = 'lidar' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT timestamp, range, velocity FROM radar_data WHERE velocity > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, distance FROM lidar_data WHERE distance BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT id, timestamp, image_path FROM camera_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Cameras WHERE id = 1;
SELECT camera_name, location FROM Cameras WHERE resolution = '4K';
SELECT lidar_name, max_range FROM LiDAR ORDER BY max_range DESC;
SELECT * FROM Radar WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM AnalysisData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Cameras WHERE id = 1;
SELECT camera_name, location FROM Cameras WHERE resolution = '1080p' ORDER BY camera_name DESC;
SELECT lidar_name, location, max_range FROM LiDAR ORDER BY max_range DESC, location ASC;
SELECT radar_name, detection_range FROM Radar WHERE location LIKE '%City%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT timestamp, data_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
